list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove all configuration and dotfiles
Deleted custom Starship, zsh, tmux, and other configuration files, including the README and `.gitignore`. This marks a cleanup or migration away from the existing dotfiles setup. IntelliJ project files were updated accordingly.

task.summary:
Add initial dotfiles setup with configurations and install script
This commit introduces an organized structure for managing dotfiles, including configurations for Alacritty, tmux, and zsh. A bash script is added to automate the installation process, setting up symlinks and installing required tools and plugins. Also includes a `.gitignore` and IntelliJ project files.

Add initial dotfiles setup with configurations and install script
This commit introduces an organized structure for managing dotfiles, including configurations for Alacritty, tmux, and zsh. A bash script is added to automate the installation process, setting up symlinks and installing required tools and plugins. Also includes a `.gitignore` and IntelliJ project files.

Update README.md to use English instead of French
Converted all text in the README file from French to English for better accessibility. This improves usability for non-French-speaking users and ensures broader adoption.

Remove AugmentWebviewStateStore.xml from version control
The file appears to be an IDE-specific configuration file and not relevant to the project's source code. Removing it helps clean up the repository and avoid unnecessary clutter.

Add OS detection and package installation logic
Enhanced the installation script with operating system detection to handle macOS, Linux, and WSL. Introduced a unified function for package installation across different OS distributions and automated setup for tools like tmux, zsh, Oh My Posh, lsd, and fzf. Improved messaging and streamlined symlink creation process.

Add ranger file manager configuration and preview script
Add `rc.conf` for ranger configuration to customize file manager behavior, settings, and keybindings. Include `scope.sh` for enhanced file previews, supporting multiple file types, images, and archives.

Enhance and optimize tmux configuration with new features
Added improved clipboard support, window and pane management bindings, and a powerline-style status bar. Enhanced plugin integration, sidebar functionality, and visual customizations. Adjusted performance settings, added session and layout commands, and refined plugin configurations for better usability and productivity.

Enhance zsh configuration and install additional tools
Updated `.zshrc` with new plugins, aliases, and functions for improved usability and customization. Expanded `install.sh` to include tools like `bat`, `ripgrep`, `fd`, `htop`, `tree`, and `jq` for enhanced system functionality.

``` Add custom Oh My Posh theme with Python venv support
Created a personalized theme based on catppuccin_macchiato to display the active Python virtual environment in the prompt. Added logic to handle theme creation and fallback to the default theme if needed. Introduced new functions and aliases for easier virtual environment management. ```

Add front-end, Rust, and Go development tools and aliases
Enhanced support for front-end (Angular, Svelte, Node.js), Rust, and Go development by adding aliases, utility functions, and installation scripts for essential tools. Updated `zshrc` to include relevant plugins and commands, and extended `install.sh` with automated setup for necessary dependencies.

Simplify zsh and tmux configurations
Streamlined zsh settings by fixing color issues and improving `ls` behavior on macOS. Simplified tmux key bindings, removed vim-tmux navigator plugin for better usability, and adjusted pane navigation. Removed unnecessary vim session restoration in tmux-resurrect for a cleaner setup.

Replace Oh My Posh with Starship prompt configuration
Switched from Oh My Posh to Starship for a modern and customizable prompt. Updated installation scripts and zsh configuration to integrate Starship. Added a Starship configuration file inspired by the Catppuccin Macchiato theme.
Remove Yarn installation logic from install script

Add checks for Oh My Zsh and Starship existence and reinstall
Ensure Oh My Zsh and Starship are properly sourced or reinstalled if missing. Adds detailed instructions and fallback mechanisms, including a simple prompt if Starship is unavailable. Enhances robustness of install scripts and improves error handling and user guidance.

Remove all configuration and dotfiles
Deleted custom dotfiles for zsh, tmux, alacritty, and others, along with the README and `.gitignore`. This indicates a cleanup or a migration from the previous configuration files.

Remove all configuration and dotfiles
Deleted custom Starship, zsh, tmux, and other configuration files, including the README and `.gitignore`. This marks a cleanup or migration away from the existing dotfiles setup. IntelliJ project files were updated accordingly.

MESSAGE.value:
Add initial dotfiles setup with configurations and install script
This commit introduces an organized structure for managing dotfiles, including configurations for Alacritty, tmux, and zsh. A bash script is added to automate the installation process, setting up symlinks and installing required tools and plugins. Also includes a `.gitignore` and IntelliJ project files.

Update README.md to use English instead of French
Converted all text in the README file from French to English for better accessibility. This improves usability for non-French-speaking users and ensures broader adoption.

Remove AugmentWebviewStateStore.xml from version control
The file appears to be an IDE-specific configuration file and not relevant to the project's source code. Removing it helps clean up the repository and avoid unnecessary clutter.

Add OS detection and package installation logic

Introduced a unified function for package installation across different OS distributions and automated setup for tools like tmux, zsh, Oh My Posh, lsd, and fzf. Add ranger file manager configuration and preview script

Added improved clipboard support, window and pane management bindings, and a powerline-style status bar. Enhanced plugin integration, sidebar functionality, and visual customizations. Add front-end, Rust, and Go development tools and aliases

Updated `zshrc` to include relevant plugins and commands, and extended `install.sh` with automated setup for necessary dependencies.

Remove all configuration and dotfiles
Deleted custom dotfiles for zsh, tmux, alacritty, and others, along with the README and `.gitignore`. This indicates a cleanup or a migration from the previous configuration files.

Deleted custom Starship, zsh, tmux, and other configuration files, including the README and `.gitignore`. This marks a cleanup or migration away from the existing dotfiles setup. IntelliJ project files were updated accordingly.
